General.Name: Jiangsu Aoyang Technology Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Aoyang Health Industry Co.ltd. produces and sells chemical fibers in China and internationally. It engages in the investment and development in the health industry; manufacture and sale of viscose fiber and viscose fiber products, degradable fibers, and functional fibers; sale of textile raw materials, textiles, and chemical products; steam heat supply; power production; and self-operated and agency of the import and export of commodities and technologies. In addition, it offers health management and pharmaceutical logistics, as well as distributes pharmaceutical products. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Aoyang Technology Corporation Limited. and changed its name to Jiangsu Aoyang Health Industry Co.ltd. in September 2018. Jiangsu Aoyang Health Industry Co.ltd. was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

2.Name: Mr. Chao  Ji
2.Title: Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director
